com.practice.lcn.calc

Class EqtSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.practice.lcn.calc.EqtSolver

  • public class EqtSolver
extends java.lang.Object
    This class serves for equation parsing and solving by using the 3rd-party library mXparser.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String RESULT_NAN
      shown in the result display when the computation result is Double.NaN.
      static java.lang.String RESULT_NEG_INFTY
      shown in the result display when the computation result is Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY.
      static java.lang.String RESULT_POS_INFTY
      shown in the result display when the computation result is Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY.
      static java.lang.String RESULT_SYN_ERR
      shown in the result display when a syntax error occurs, such as missing closing parenthesis.

      • solve

        public java.lang.String solve()
        solve the equation
        Returns:

        public static boolean hadErr(java.lang.String prevResult)
